entries.question: Where are we told to look for evidence of His power?
entries.authorNote: The sun, moon and stars are all evidences of His power. They are all held in space by an unseen hand. The sun is a great ball of undying fire many times larger than this earth; the stars have never been counted. But the true God knows all their names. Astronomers are continually discovering new stars. The stars are so far away that we are unable to comprehend or even calculate their distance.

entries.question: WHAT DOES THE TRUE GOD SAY OF MAN MADE GODS?
Does the true God allow anyone to make an image to represent Him?
